name: Justice Prevails In BugWest
description:
THE 1978 GAMING HIT GAME RETURNS... the new entry in the BUGWEST GAMING SERIES: "JUSTICE PREVAILS IN BUGWEST!"

In the microtown of BugWest, located in a crevice next to a popular human town in the good ol' West, there are laws to be followed, and heroes that bend those who bend the rules which is ILLEGAL.
Antony, Junior Sheriff of the microtown, today faces the last trial before receiving the TRUE SHERIFF STAR, symbol of courage, bravery, lionheart! that only TRUE SHERIFFS are allowed to wear...

But to do so he needs to find...

THE OUTLAW!

Can you help him...?

✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰✰

Made by HalfAlieno in occasion of the Mini Jam 16 + Even Weekend Game Jam: Western

Game made in: Bitsy
Music made in: BeepBox
Language help: True western knowledge site....
